description: Sequential numeric identifier of each line listing
Date of broadcast on DXY.cn
Summary of DXY.cn information on the case
Location in which the case occurred
Country in which the case occurred
Case gender
Case age
Date of onset clinical symptoms
The onset date was approximated (vs. precise date information)
Date the case visited a hospital
Type of medical facility visited
Date exposure started
Date exposure ended
The case visited Wuhan
The case is a resident of Wuhan
Case died
Date case died (starting 2020-02-20)
Case recovered
Date case recovered (starting 2020-02-20
Description of clinical symptoms
Name of the source listed in DXY.cn broadcast
URL to the source lsited in the DXY.cn broadcast
Sequential number of cases in the same country
Binary, flag 1 if the case was traveling
Binary, flag 1 if the case was an international traveler
Binary, flag 1 if the case was a domestic traveler
